meanings.definition: Subjected to high pressure and heat to create a smooth surface.
meanings.sent1: The hotpressed shirt felt very smooth against my skin.
meanings.sent2: The hotpressed fabric had a glossy finish.
meanings.sent3: I wish my homework could be hotpressed to make it look neater!
meanings.sent4: Her hair was like hotpressed silk, shining in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The hotpressed chocolate melted smoothly in my mouth.

meanings.definition: A method of manufacturing paper by applying heat and pressure.
meanings.sent1: The hotpressed paper had a uniform texture.
meanings.sent2: Hotpressed paper is known for its durability.
meanings.sent3: The hotpressed paper whispered secrets when crumpled.
meanings.sent4: His words were like hotpressed paper, carefully crafted and impactful.
meanings.sent5: The hotpressed document felt substantial in my hands.

meanings.definition: A type of printing process using a hot press.
meanings.sent1: The hotpressed images had sharp details.
meanings.sent2: Hotpressed prints are popular for their clarity.
meanings.sent3: The hotpressed poster winked at me from the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a hotpressed picture, capturing a perfect moment.
meanings.sent5: The hotpressed brochure stood out among the others.
